attributes.name: Gedenkstätte Breitenau
attributes.history:
During the Nazi period, an early concentration camp (1933-1934) and later a so-called educational work camp (Arbeitserziehungslager, 1940-1945) existed in the former monastery which had been dissolved in the l6th century. For the most part, German political opponents were interned in the concentration camp in order to be disciplined and intimidated. In the "education work camp", approximately 6.500 foreign forced laborers who had either refused to work or who had violated Nazi regulations (by associating with Germans, for example) were detained. Through punishment they were to become more submissive in their next work assignment. In addition, there were approximately 2.000 Germans imprisoned, among them approximately 250 Jews. Of the more than 8.000 prisoners, approximately 1.800 were deported to various concentration camps.
(Source: http://www.gedenkstaette-breitenau.de/english.htm)

attributes.name: Archiv des Deutschen Museums
attributes.holdings: The Deutsches Museum Archives is one of Europe’s most important archives specializing in the history of science and technology.  Altogether it has some 4500 m of shelves holding source documents and other archive material on this subject.  Particular points of emphasis are transport and aerospace, computing, and the history of physics and chemistry.

attributes.name: Ministère de la Défense: Dépôt central d'archives de la justice militaire
otherFormsOfName: Ministry of Defense: Repository of military justice records
attributes.history:
The "Service historique de la défense" (SHD) (Defence Historical Service) is the record centre for the french ministry of defence.

It was created on 1st January 2005 as one of the State reforms, and it is a national department attached to the DMPA (Direction de la mémoire, du patrimoine et des archives - Department of Memory, Heritage and Records), one of the Secretariat-General for administration (SGA) departments of the ministry of defence. It is the result of an amalgamation of the four traditional armed forces, the army, the navy, the air force and the police force, together with the arms record centre and the Châtellerault personnel.

With its responsibilities for monitoring, collecting, preserving and sharing records from the ministry of defence, the SHD heads all the specialised libraries in France because of the wealth of its offerings. As one of its objectives, it also contributes to work relating to the history of defence and handles the issues of military badges.

The Defence Historical Service consists of the historic records centre (with bases in Vincennes, Cherbourg, Brest, Lorient, Rochefort, Toulon, Caen, Le Blanc and Fontainebleau), the arms and personnel records centre (based in Châtellerault), an administrative and financial service and a logistics support division.
attributes.holdings: This department holds the records of military justice after 1924.

address.streetAddress: Esplanade Martial Taugourdeau Pont de Mainvilliers

attributes.name: Національна бібліотека України імені В. І. Вернадського, Інститут рукопису
parallelFormsOfName: Institute of Manuscripts, V. I. Vernads'kyi National Library of Ukraine
Natsional'na biblioteka Ukrainy im. V. I. Vernads'koho, Instytut rukopysu
attributes.history: Established 2 of August 1918 as the National Ukrainian Library, from 1988 holds the name of V.I. Vernardskyi.
attributes.administrativeStructure:
•	Відділ кодикології та кодикографії

•	Відділ джерелознавства

•	Відділ фондів рукописної спадщини

•	Відділ фонду юдаїки
attributes.holdings: На початковому етапі діяльності (1918–1930-ті роки), головним завданням Бібліотеки стало накопичення книжкових і рукописних зібрань та колекцій – у ній стрімко концентруються значні за обсягами приватні зібрання, архівні комплекси націоналізованих установ, фонди зліквідованих бібліотек та видавнича продукція друкарень, освітніх та релігійних установ, громадських організацій тощо. Від 1918 р., часу заснування Бібліотеки, і включно з повоєнними роками до фондів відділу рукописів увійшла колосальна кількість рукописних зібрань та колекцій. Значну частину колекційного фонду складають документи наукових установ. Зокрема, це великі за обсягом та складні за структурою архіви реорганізованої в 1934 р. Всеукраїнської академії наук, а також Українського науково-дослідного інституту книгознавства. Цінні архіви, колекції та зібрання містяться у фондах наукових товариств. Серед найбільш значимих фондів – колекції, зібрання та архіви знакових дореволюційних вищих і середніх навчальних закладів. Фонди просвітницьких товариств та організацій репрезентовані архівом Київської «Просвіти», одного з найактивніших в Україні просвітницьких товариств; а також архівом та зібранням Кабінету єврейської культури, завдання якого полягало в збиранні та опрацюванні національного фольклору та етнографічних пам’яток. Важливими є архіви, зібрання та колекції музейних установ. У фондах Інституту містяться також редакційні портфелі періодичних видань та українських видавництв кінця ХІХ ст. – 1920-х років.

attributes.name: Галузевий державний архів Служби безпеки України
parallelFormsOfName: Sectoral State Archive of the Security Service of Ukraine
Haluzevyi derzhavnyi arkhiv Sluzhby Bezpeky Ukrainy

address.streetAddress: Malopidvalna str., 16, Kyiv (postal address), Zolotovoritska str., 7 (actual location)

attributes.history: Sectoral State Archive of the Security Service of Ukraine was established by the decision of Ukraine Prime Minister Cabinet on first of April 1994.
attributes.generalContext: Archive holds documents of Ukrainian Republic Security Service (and former Ukrainian Soviet Republic), from the period 1918-until today.  Archive holds documents from Security Service  Kiev headquarters and provincial branches.
attributes.mandates:
Archive operates on the basis of the decision of Ukraine Prime Minister Cabinet on first of April 1994, No 206. 

On the basis of the decree ofthe President of Ukraine from 6 of June 2011, No 649,  Sectoral State Archive of the Security Service of Ukraine is a branch of Security Service of the Ukrainian Republic.
attributes.holdings:
Archive holds 87 Research Groups encompassing around 225.000 of the archival folders. 

One of the  oldest documents in the archive are from 1918, and are referring to the establishment of Soviet Security in Ukraine- Cheka.

Archive holds also collections of the documents from pre-1917 period, letters, photographs and others. 

Most important collections of the archives are documents of: 
- Ukrainian Soviet Republic Security Services
- criminal records from the soviet and post-sovier period 
- documentation of the victims of the Soviet totalitarism, among them folders referring to many important personalities of Ukrainian political, cultural and social life 
-  documents of the political parties active in Ukraine in period of Revolution, Civil War and Ukrainian Peoples Republic 
- documents referring to the economical and social life in the Ukrainian Soviet Republic
- Documents referring to the Second World War, among them: of soviet espionage and  counterespionage services, partisan groups, on German occupation and administation on Ukraine, 
- personal files of the Soviet Security Service emloyees
attributes.openingTimes: Reading Room of the Archive is opened from Monday till Friday,  between 9.30 am and 5.15 pm,  besides last day of the each month.
attributes.accessibility: Archive had reading room opened for reaserchers.

attributes.name: Steiermärkisches Landesarchiv
attributes.history: In 1959 after the return of the archives displaced during WWII, a total inventory with the first comprehensive overview of the collections of the Steiermärkischen Landesarchiv was published. Subsequent acquisition of historically significant archives made​​the extension of the magazine capacity necessary. Now the Archive is undergoing an extensive process to make their collections accessible online.
attributes.holdings: Collections of the Steiermärkisches Landesarchiv include the state administrative archives (until 1925), court archives, finance and land registry archives. The Landesarchiv also holds materials on regional (until 1925), state government (after 1926) and district commission (Bezirkshauptmannschaften - after 1924), in addition to state building administration, hospitals and railways. The Körperschafts- und Privatarchive contain family, community, religious and individual records. Among others contains restitution- and/or compensation-related materials: Opferfürsorge-Akten Steiermark (deceased applicants); closed files; restriction: retention period of 100 years, access is permitted for scientific projects
